short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the wisdom of the universe with AI-generated horoscopes and personalized answers to your questions in every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reveal the wisdom of the stars in every new tab: Astro Answer is a new tab extension that displays a draggable and zoomable celestial map centered to your current location right now.
It delivers AI-generated horoscopes for your zodiac sign each day and offers the possibility to ask any question may it be trivial or deep. The AI (the all-knowing universe) will answer all your questions!
